Stat 240.Name: Data Science Modeling I
Stat 240.Description: Introduces reproducible data management, modeling, and analysis through a practical, hands-on case studies approach. Topics include the use of an integrated statistical computing environment, data wrangling, the R programming language, data graphics and visualization, random variables and concepts of probability, data modeling, and report generation using R Markdown with applications to a wide variety of data to address open-ended questions.
Stat 240.SubjectNotes: This is the statistics department. Have an enrollment question? Visit https://stat.wisc.edu/courses-and-enrollment/.
Stat 240.Subject: Statistics
